name: Roy Tang
text: I was about to say "the most well-known sci-fi authors seem to be progressive", but then I remembered Orson Scott Card exists. My observation was probably influenced by my watching Star Trek Voyager these past few weeks. Maybe I should limit the scope of my hypothesis from "fans of sci-fi" to "fans of Star Trek"
